name: House of Hermes
description:
Play as Hermes' godly minion and  cheat at dice to make a fortune. This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. 

CONTROLS:

WASD/Dpad to move

Z / A to Push

Enter/Start to Reroll ( Restarts level if you get stuck, but also gives you a new starting value!)

Shift/Select to save game

Made in GB Studio: https://www.gbstudio.dev/

Sprites made with pixeldudesmaker by 0x72: https://0x72.itch.io/pixeldudesmaker

Pixel art made at https://www.pixilart.com/

Cover image referenced from Morning Dress by Marc-Luc.

Known bugs: Sometimes dice gets stuck on 2. Hit enter to reset. Sorry :/
